context: Wow, "thank you" to all who support this and make it reality. Please spay and neuter!!

Awesome!    So many pets waiting for adoption in shelters.   It’s an epidemic, that costs these pets their life.   I’ve spent my entire adult life advocating for adoption of animals in shelters.  I volunteer at my local Humane Society and run adoption clinics twice a month.    Very awesome to see others getting involved.  👍🏼🥰🐈🐕🐇🦮🐩
Finally, a useful purpose for an otherwise mindless pursuit.
Animals are great! 🙉🐽🐸🐺🐟🦞Animals are great! 🐶🦁🐷🐰🐹🐣Right Gutfeld?
Rescues dogs and cats make the best pets.   We love our furry friends 🐾.
